n1.speaker: Narrator
n1.text: The cake box sits empty. When did this happen?

n2_dinner.speaker: Helper: Dietitian
n2_dinner.text: Dinner cases usually mean fatigue or pressure. What drove it?

n2_lunch.speaker: Helper: Analyst
n2_lunch.text: Midday tells a different story. What happened?

n3_social.speaker: Narrator
n3_social.text: This was about belonging, not cake. Plan a portion boundary next time.

n3_stress.speaker: Narrator
n3_stress.text: Stress leaves fingerprints on every case. We reduce damage, not seek perfection.

choices.label: Agree to 10 minute walk before next meal

n3_hunger.speaker: Narrator
n3_hunger.text: Under-fueling creates rebound cases. Add protein earlier tomorrow.

n5.speaker: Narrator
n5.text: Case filed. Monitor hunger and stress tomorrow morning.

m1.speaker: Narrator
m1.text: The kitchen light was on past midnight. What was the signal?

m2_sleep.speaker: Helper: Sleep Whisperer
m2_sleep.text: Sleep debt masquerades as hunger. We aim for containment.

choices.label: Agree to brush teeth and close kitchen

m2_lonely.speaker: Helper: Analyst
m2_lonely.text: Loneliness distorts hunger signals. We replace the pattern.

choices.label: Agree to text a friend instead

m4.speaker: Narrator
m4.text: Signal to watch: bedtime consistency tomorrow.
